Title: string_to_table
Feature: string_to_table ( string text, delimiter text [, null_string text ] ) → setof text
Description: Splits the string at occurrences of delimiter and returns the resulting fields as a set of text rows. If delimiter is NULL, each character in the string will become a separate row of the result. If delimiter is an empty string, then the string is treated as a single field. If null_string is supplied and is not NULL, fields matching that string are replaced by NULL.
